00031 template <class Product>
00032 class TSupplierCompWrap:
00033                      public ibase::CLoggerComponentBase,
00034                      virtual public ISupplier
00035 {
00036 public:
00037        typedef ibase::CLoggerComponentBase BaseClass;
00038        typedef Product ProductType;
00039 
00040        enum MessageId
00041        {
00042               MI_DURATION_TIME = 0x077a1b
00043        };
00044 
00045        I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TSupplierCompWrap);
00046               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(ISupplier);
00047               I_ASSIGN(m_diagnosticNameAttrPtr, "DiagnosticName", "Name of this supplier for diagnostic, if it is not set, no diagnostic log message will be send", false, "");
00048               I_ASSIGN(m_paramsSetCompPtr, "ParamsSet", "Parameters set describing model parameter used to produce results", false, "ParamsSet");
00049               I_ASSIGN_TO(m_paramsSetModelCompPtr, m_paramsSetCompPtr, false);
00050               I_ASSIGN_MULTI_0(m_additionalTriggerInputsCompPtr, "AdditionalTriggerInputs", "Additional observed trigger inputs, the supplier will be invalidated if some input signal the change", false);
00051        I_END_COMPONENT;
00052 
00053        TSupplierCompWrap();
00054 
00055        // reimplemented (iproc::ISupplier)
00056        virtual void InvalidateSupplier();
00057        virtual void EnsureWorkFinished();
00058        virtual void ClearWorkResults();
00059        virtual int GetWorkStatus() const;
00060        virtual iprm::IParamsSet* GetModelParametersSet() const;
00061 
00062 protected:
00066        const Product* GetWorkProduct() const;
00067 
00073        virtual void RegisterSupplierInput(imod::IModel* modelPtr);
00078        virtual void UnregisterSupplierInput(imod::IModel* modelPtr);
00079 
00080        // abstract methods
00085        virtual int ProduceObject(Product& result) const = 0;
00086 
00087        // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
00088        virtual void OnComponentCreated();
00089        virtual void OnComponentDestroyed();
00090 
00091        class InputObserver: public imod::CMultiModelObserverBase
00092        {
00093        public:
00094               InputObserver(TSupplierCompWrap<Product>* parentPtr);
00095 
00096               using imod::CMultiModelObserverBase::EnsureModelsDetached;
00097 
00098        protected:
00099               // reimplemented (imod::CMultiModelObserverBase)
00100               virtual void OnUpdate(imod::IModel* modelPtr, int updateFlags, istd::IPolymorphic* updateParamsPtr);
00101 
00102        private:
00103               TSupplierCompWrap<Product>& m_parent;
00104        };
00105 
00106 private:
00107        I_ATTR(QString, m_diagnosticNameAttrPtr);
00108        I_REF(iprm::IParamsSet, m_paramsSetCompPtr);
00109        I_REF(imod::IModel, m_paramsSetModelCompPtr);
00110        I_MULTIREF(imod::IModel, m_additionalTriggerInputsCompPtr);
00111 
00112        istd::TDelPtr<Product> m_productPtr;
00113        int m_workStatus;
00114 
00115        InputObserver m_inputObserver;
00116 };

00121 template <class Product>
00122 TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::TSupplierCompWrap()
00123 :      m_workStatus(WS_NONE),
00124        m_inputObserver(this)
00125 {
00126 }
00127 
00128 
00129 template <class Product>
00130 iprm::IParamsSet* TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::GetModelParametersSet() const
00131 {
00132        return m_paramsSetCompPtr.GetPtr();
00133 }

00135 
00136 // pseudo-reimplemented (iproc::ISupplier)
00137 
00138 template <class Product>
00139 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::InvalidateSupplier()
00140 {
00141        if (m_workStatus == ISupplier::WS_LOCKED){
00142               return;
00143        }
00144 
00145        if (m_workStatus != ISupplier::WS_INIT){
00146               istd::CChangeNotifier notifier(this, ISupplier::CF_SUPPLIER_RESULTS);
00147 
00148               m_workStatus = ISupplier::WS_INIT;
00149        }
00150 }
00151 
00152 
00153 template <class Product>
00154 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::EnsureWorkFinished()
00155 {
00156        if (m_workStatus <= ISupplier::WS_INIT){
00157               istd::CChangeNotifier notifier(this, ISupplier::CF_SUPPLIER_RESULTS);
00158 
00159               m_workStatus = WS_LOCKED;
00160 
00161               if (!m_productPtr.IsValid()){
00162                      m_productPtr.SetPtr(new Product());
00163               }
00164 
00165               m_workStatus = ProduceObject(*m_productPtr);
00166               I_ASSERT(m_workStatus >= WS_OK);   // No initial states are possible
00167        }
00168 }
00169 
00170 
00171 template <class Product>
00172 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::ClearWorkResults()
00173 {
00174        if (m_workStatus != ISupplier::WS_NONE){
00175               istd::CChangeNotifier notifier(this, ISupplier::CF_SUPPLIER_RESULTS);
00176 
00177               m_productPtr.Reset();
00178 
00179               m_workStatus = ISupplier::WS_NONE;
00180        }
00181 }
00182 
00183 
00184 template <class Product>
00185 int TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::GetWorkStatus() const
00186 {
00187        return m_workStatus;
00188 }
00189 
00190 
00191 // protected methods
00192 
00193 template <class Product>
00194 const Product* TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::GetWorkProduct() const
00195 {
00196        const_cast< TSupplierCompWrap<Product>* >(this)->EnsureWorkFinished();
00197 
00198        if (m_workStatus == WS_OK){
00199               return m_productPtr.GetPtr();
00200        }
00201        else{
00202               return NULL;
00203        }
00204 }
00205 
00206 
00207 template <class Product>
00208 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::RegisterSupplierInput(imod::IModel* modelPtr)
00209 {
00210        I_ASSERT(modelPtr != NULL);
00211        modelPtr->AttachObserver(&m_inputObserver);
00212 }
00213 
00214 
00215 template <class Product>
00216 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::UnregisterSupplierInput(imod::IModel* modelPtr)
00217 {
00218        I_ASSERT(modelPtr != NULL);
00219        if (m_inputObserver.IsModelAttached(modelPtr)){
00220               modelPtr->DetachObserver(&m_inputObserver);
00221        }
00222 }
00223 
00224 
00225 // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
00226 
00227 template <class Product>
00228 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::OnComponentCreated()
00229 {
00230        BaseClass::OnComponentCreated();
00231 
00232        if (m_paramsSetModelCompPtr.IsValid()){
00233               m_paramsSetModelCompPtr->AttachObserver(&m_inputObserver);
00234        }
00235 
00236        int inputsCount = m_additionalTriggerInputsCompPtr.GetCount();
00237        for (int i = 0; i < inputsCount; ++i){
00238               imod::IModel* inputModelPtr = m_additionalTriggerInputsCompPtr[i];
00239               if (inputModelPtr != NULL){
00240                      RegisterSupplierInput(inputModelPtr);
00241               }
00242        }
00243 
00244        m_workStatus = ISupplier::WS_NONE;
00245 }
00246 
00247 
00248 template <class Product>
00249 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::OnComponentDestroyed()
00250 {
00251        m_inputObserver.EnsureModelsDetached();
00252 
00253        BaseClass::OnComponentDestroyed();
00254 }
00255 
00256 
00257 // public methods of embedded class InputObserver
00258 
00259 template <class Product>
00260 TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::InputObserver::InputObserver(TSupplierCompWrap<Product>* parentPtr)
00261 :      m_parent(*parentPtr)
00262 {
00263        I_ASSERT(parentPtr != NULL);
00264 }
00265 
00266 
00267 // protected methods of embedded class InputObserver
00268 
00269 // reimplemented (imod::CMultiModelObserverBase)
00270 
00271 template <class Product>
00272 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::InputObserver::OnUpdate(imod::IModel* /*modelPtr*/, int /*updateFlags*/, istd::IPolymorphic* /*updateParamsPtr*/)
00273 {
00274        m_parent.InvalidateSupplier();
00275 }
